tasks.title: Layer 0: Infrastructure Setup (Envoy & Docker)
tasks.description: Create `envoy.yaml` to intercept traffic on port 10000 and `docker-compose.yaml` to orchestrate the Sidecar pattern with Envoy, Redis, and Postgres.

tasks.title: Layer 1: Runtime Identity Service
tasks.description: Implement `RuntimeIdentityService.java` to verify local process identity. Use a mock implementation initially if OS-level access is restricted.

tasks.title: Layer 3: Deterministic Rule Engine
tasks.description: Implement `DeterministicRuleEngine.java` for hard policy checks (e.g., blocking specific paths like /admin).

tasks.title: Layer 5: Traffic Light Service (Core Logic)
tasks.description: Implement `TrafficLightService.java` to coordinate Layer 1 (Identity) -> Layer 3 (Rules) -> Layer 4 (Judges) and return a RiskLevel.

tasks.title: Integration: Veil Security Filter
tasks.description: Modify `VeilSecurityFilter.java` to inject `TrafficLightService` and enforce the 7-layer check on incoming requests.
